The second Light Strip (ID: 363f714d-e4fe-4052-a78c-f8c97542e709) is also off, with a brightness level of 48 and a color temperature of 7000K. The third Light Strip (ID: 571f0327-6507-4674-b9cf-fe68f7d9522d) is off, set to a brightness level of 35 and a color temperature of 2300K. The Samsung TVs are both on, while the dishwasher is off, and the refrigerator is on. The command to set up lights for dinner will require turning on the Light Strips and adjusting their brightness and color settings accordingly.
